"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54823d8f636872247e870100#post_54823d8f636872247e870100
The Warrant Officer ranks are agonizing to get through, but when you do, you can usually skyrocket to Lt. Colonel within a couple weeks afterwards.

It doesn't slow down much again until the Commander ranks, which I just passed.
